price: 31. Yalli Nabii Aadam ummaan iimih migaaqitte inkih kaa Barseh, tohuk lakal woo migaaqitte Yalli malaykal xayyoyseeh tahiimih migaaqitte yoh warisa isin ittaanamat Numma yacee mara tekkeenik keenik iyye Yalli.
arabic: وَعَلَّمَ ءَادَمَ ٱلۡأَسۡمَآءَ كُلَّهَا ثُمَّ عَرَضَهُمۡ عَلَى ٱلۡمَلَٰٓئِكَةِ فَقَالَ أَنۢبِـُٔونِي بِأَسۡمَآءِ هَٰٓؤُلَآءِ إِن كُنتُمۡ صَٰدِقِينَ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: waʿallama ādama al-asmāa kullahā thumma ʿaraḍahum ʿalā al-malāikati faqāla anbiūnī bi-asmāi hāulāi in kuntum ṣādiqīna
